Package com.mapdigit.gis.service

The packge defines Digital map service interface.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICellIdGeocoder
    query cell id geo addresses.
    IDirectionQuery
    This class is used to query driving directions.
    IGeocoder
    This class is used to query geo addresses.
    IGeocodingListener
    Callback when geocoding query is finished.
    IIpAddressGeocoder
    query ip address geo addresses.
    IIpAddressGeocodingListener
    Callback when geocoding query is finished.
    ILocalSearch
    This class is used to query geo addresses.
    IReverseGeocoder
    query reverse geo coding.
    IReverseGeocodingListener
    Callback when geocoding query is finished.
    IRoutingListener
    Callback when routing query is finished.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CellIdGeocoder
    This class is used to communicate directly with Google servers to obtain geocodes for user specified addresses.
    DigitalMapService
    This class is used to store driving directions results
    IpAddressGeocoder
    This class is used to communicate directly with Google servers to obtain geocodes for user specified addresses.
    IpAddressLocation
    IP address location info.
    MapKey
    This class defines the map service key for different map servers.
    MapKeyRepository
    MapKeyRepsoitory store all map keys used for map service.
    SearchOptions
    This class is used to store driving directions options

Package com.mapdigit.gis.service Description

The packge defines Digital map service interface.
